successes.title: Mellow – The Electric Drive that fits under every Skateboard
successes.description: The first mountable electric drive that turns any normal skateboard into an electric skateboard – within minutes.

Pledges.description: DIGITAL DANKESCHÖN: Because we can’t hug you personally for supporting us, we will send you a video of our happy-like-crazy-dance instead. THANK YOU!!!
T-SHIRT „FOOTLOOSE“: Step up your street-style. This uniquely designed T-Shirt proves: Mellow makes not only wheels but also heads spin.
HOODIE „ENDLESS RIDER“: If you just can’t stop playing outside, this warm hoodie might become one of your best buddies.
COLLECTORS DECK: One unique design – four different decks to choose from. Pick your favorite shape and get on board with the Mellow Movement.
MELLOW EARLY BIRD: Ready, steady, roll! This special offer includes the mountable Mellow Drive with engraved backer number, remote and charger. Retail Value: 1699 €.
MELLOW MEDIUM EARLY BIRD: Ready, steady, roll! This special offer includes the mountable Mellow Drive with engraved backer number, remote and charger. Retail Value: 1699 €.

MELLOW + BOARD EARLY BIRD: Be quick and get the full package for just 999 €! Including the Mellow Drive mounted on a handmade board from BuddyBuddy (Flat) or Bastlboards (Nose-/Kicktail). Complete with engraved backer number, remote and charger. Retail Value: 1999 €.
MELLOW LATE EARLY BIRD: Ready, steady, roll! This special offer includes the mountable Mellow Drive with engraved backer number, remote and charger. Retail Value: 1699 €.

MELLOW + BOARD MEDIUM EARLY BIRD: Be quick and get the full package for just 1.050 €! Including the Mellow Drive mounted on a handmade board from BuddyBuddy (Flat) or Bastlboards (Nose-/Kicktail). Complete with engraved backer number, remote and charger. Retail Value: 1999 €.

MELLOW KICKSTARTER SPECIAL: Only on Kickstarter: Get the Mellow Drive with engraved backer number, remote and charger for just 1.099 €. 
Retail Value: 1699 €.

MELLOW + BOARD LATE EARLY BIRD: Be quick and get the full package for just 1.199 €! Including the Mellow Drive mounted on a handmade board from BuddyBuddy (Flat) or Bastlboards (Nose-/Kicktail). Complete with engraved backer number, remote and charger. Retail Value: 1999 €.
MELLOW EARLY SHIPPING: Be the first to get the Mellow Drive under your board! Including the Mellow Drive with engraved backer number, remote and charger. Retail Value: 1699 €.

MELLOW + BOARD KICKSTARTER SPECIAL: Get the full setup for just 1.399 €. Including the Mellow Drive mounted on a handmade board from BuddyBuddy (Flat) or Bastlboards (Nose-/Kicktail). Complete with engraved backer number, remote and charger. Retail Value: 1999 €.
4WD SPECIAL: Get 2 Mellow Drives synchronized as 4WD with one remote and all necessary accessories for just 1.600 €!

MELLOW + BOARD EARLY SHIPPING: Be the first to ride a Mellow Board! Including the Mellow Drive mounted on a handmade board from BuddyBuddy (Flat) or Bastlboards (Nose-/Kicktail). Complete with engraved backer number, remote and charger. Retail Value: 1999 €.

MEET THE MELLOW TEAM: Pick up your Mellow Board personally in our headquarter in Hamburg and get an exclusive look behind the scenes of Mellow. We will show you where the magic happens inside and outside our own four walls. And of course we will take you for an endless ride around the city when we all join the Green Skate Hamburg 2016. A 3 nights stay in the Rockstar Suite at Superbude St. Pauli for you and a firend is included as well as transfer from and to Hamburg airport/main station. Travel tickets are not included.
EARLY DISTRIBUTOR DEAL: Get 5 Mellow Drives with all necessary accessories for just 5.000 €!
